analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0x3c07b3f4a6e253915d83c86707f0af07521d1cd8.sol:
	Contract APIHeaven has payable functions:
	 - sale (/unique_chucks/11/0x3c07b3f4a6e253915d83c86707f0af07521d1cd8.sol#82-92)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0x3c07b3f4a6e253915d83c86707f0af07521d1cd8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.14 (/unique_chucks/11/0x3c07b3f4a6e253915d83c86707f0af07521d1cd8.sol#1): it allows old versions
